title: Holy Trinity
description: Evil brews in the boys of Trinity High. Drop dead gorgeous. The flame of hell in their eyes. And rage. Pure, unadulterated rage in every word, every look and every breath they send my way.  There's every indication they're out to break me. Maybe I'll let them. Maybe I'll bite back. After all, what's a girl got to lose when her heart's already been obliterated?  Holy Trinity is a high school bully romance fit for readers who love the transition from enemies to lovers.
author: Savannah   Rose
